name: William's Shootables
description:
This is my first-ever actual game that I made by myself. You are Bill, my friend's D&D character. Bill can shoot things. In this platformer, you can jump onto over 3 platforms and shoot over 5 shootables.

This is a work in progress. I want to add:

  • Sound effects.
  • Music effects.
  • Explosion effects.
  • Animations????? What if Bill had feet?
  • Some way to transition from level to level.
  • Fix that weird infinite jump exploit you can do if you are touching a wall.
  • What if the shootables shot back?

How to play:

  • To jump: Space or A (XB) or B (NS) or X (PS)
  • To shoot: F or X (XB) or Y (NS) or Square (PS)
  • To aim and to move: WASD or Left Analog Stick
  • To do the thing in Metroid where you can make Samus stop so you can aim better: Hold Left Shift or LB (XB) or L (NS) or L1 (PS)
  • To quit: ESC

Disclaimer: I did not ask my friend if I could use the likeness of his character for this game. However, as the DM, I do own everything that my players create. It's in the DMG, god read a book.
